LanguageData.MakeR_Manger10.label: 饲草(10)
LanguageData.MakeR_Manger10.description: 将秸秆、糠麸以及一些谷物混合制成粗制的食料，用以喂养动物。
LanguageData.MakeR_Manger20.label: 飼い葉(20)
LanguageData.MakeR_Manger20.description: 藁と米ぬか、穀物をあわせて動物の飼料(高栄養素)を作る。
LanguageData.MakeR_Manger30.label: 飼い葉(30)
LanguageData.MakeR_Manger30.description: 藁と米ぬか、穀物をあわせて動物の飼料(高栄養素)を作る。
LanguageData.MakeR_PetFood150.label: Pet food(150)
LanguageData.MakeR_PetFood150.description: Mix kibble and outher hull (rice bran) and increase pet food.
LanguageData.MakeR_FishFood150.label: Fish food(150)
LanguageData.MakeR_FishFood150.description: Make rice bran and crushed potatoes kneaded with water.
LanguageData.ZP_CollectEarthworms.label: Capture earthworms
LanguageData.ZP_CollectEarthworms.description: Capture earthworms that will improve soil and feed for fish.
